MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY3 postcode area of Burntisland. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:15pm to carryout repair work on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:52pm on 2nd February 2021.
